ygData.subject: Re: Using Trade window against KSers.
ygData.msgSnippet: I dont know HOW many times this needs to be said.   STEALING KILLS in and of itself is *NOT* bannable.  I have spoken with a few people on this subject and
ygData.messageBody:
I dont know HOW many times this needs to be said. STEALING KILLS in and
of itself is *NOT* bannable. I have spoken with a few people on this
subject and they ALL said, unless the person is running their mouth and
harrasing you, they wont do anything about it.

Mr. J Daniels


On Tue, 3 Aug 1999, David Rogers wrote:

> From: David Rogers <derogers334@...>
>
> --- "Mr. J Daniels" <warpig@...> wrote:
> > Believe it or not, but, repeatedly opening a trade
> > window on someone to interrupt their play is a
> > bannable offense. Kill Stealing, in and of itself
> > is *NOT* bannable.
>
> True, but repeatedly killstealing is a bannable
> offense *too*. Repeatedly killstealing from someone
> is harassment, and is covered in the user agreement.
> ===
> :D
> Dave's World
> -No matter where you go, there you are-
> "People will believe a lie either because they want to
> believe it's true, or because they fear it is." Wizard's
